thread.title: Dr Martin Kehler
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Dr Martin Kehler

author: Dr Martin Kehler
title: Dr Martin Kehler
text:
My patience is short - I walked out twice when trying to have my tyres done waiting in the shop - so this is brilliant having it done at work - v nice staff taking up a minimum of my work-time AND coming back to sort out an issue w my keys without being asked - excellent service
AND all this cheaper than the garages!
